## GeoCoordinates class

`GeoCoordinates` is used to represent geo positions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GeoCoordinates implements GeoCoordinatesLike 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(latitude, longitude, altitude)](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a <code>GeoCoordinates</code> from the given latitude, longitude, and optional altitude. |

|  [latitude](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.latitude.md) |  | number |  |
|  [latitudeInDegrees](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.latitudeindegrees.md) |  | number | Returns the latitude in degrees. |
|  [latitudeInRadians](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.latitudeinradians.md) |  | number | Returns the latitude in radians. |
|  [lng](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.lng.md) |  | number | The longitude in the degrees. |
|  [longitude](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.longitude.md) |  | number |  |
|  [longitudeInDegrees](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.longitudeindegrees.md) |  | number | Returns the longitude in degrees. |
|  [longitudeInRadians](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.longitudeinradians.md) |  | number | Returns the longitude in radians. |

|  [fromGeoPoint(geoPoint)](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.fromgeopoint.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a \[\[GeoCoordinates\]\] from a \[\[GeoPointLike\]\] tuple.<!-- -->Example:
```typescript
mapView.geoCenter = GeoCoordinates.fromGeoPoint([longitude, latitude]);

let geoCoords: number[] = ...;

if (isGeoPointLike(geoCoords)) {
    const p = GeoCoordinates.fromGeoPoint(geoCoords);
}

```
 |
|  [fromLatLng(latLng)](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.fromlatlng.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a \[\[GeoCoordinates\]\] from a \[\[LatLngLike\]\] literal.
```typescript
const center = { lat: 53.3, lng: 13.4 };
mapView.geoCenter = GeoCoordinates.fromLatLng(center);

```
 |
|  [fromObject(geoPoint)](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.fromobject.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a \[\[GeoCoordinates\]\] from different types of geo coordinate objects.<!-- -->Example:
```typescript
const fromGeoPointLike = GeoCoordinates.fromObject([longitude, latitude]);
const fromGeoCoordinateLike = GeoCoordinates.fromObject({ longitude, latitude });
const fromGeoCoordinate = GeoCoordinates.fromObject(new GeoCoordinates(latitude, longitude));
const fromLatLngLike = GeoCoordinates.fromObject({ lat: latitude , lng: longitude });

```

|  [fromRadians(latitude, longitude, altitude)](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.fromradians.md) | <code>static</code> | Returns a <code>GeoCoordinates</code> from the given latitude, longitude, and optional altitude. |

|  [normalized()](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.normalized.md) |  | Returns the normalized <code>GeoCoordinates</code>. |
|  [toGeoPoint()](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.togeopoint.md) |  | Converts this \[\[GeoCoordinates\]\] to a \[\[GeoPointLike\]\]. |
|  [toLatLng()](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.tolatlng.md) |  | Returns this \[\[GeoCoordinates\]\] as \[\[LatLngLike\]\] literal. |
